juzs.text: aho evanu læbu dutayini! esenam numbalage duta panividaya kumak dæ?yi ohu (ibrahim) vimasiya
“saparadhi pirisak veta niyata vasayenma api evanu læbuvemu” yæyi ovuhu pævasuha
“mætiyen yut gal (varsavak) ovun veta apa evanu pinisa.”
“simava ikmava giyavun sandaha numbage paramadhipati vetin salakunu tabanu læbuvak lesin”
evita ehi sitiyavun atarin deviyan visvasa karannan api bæhæra kalemu
eheyin avanatavannan aturin ek nivasak hæra ehi (venat kisidu nivasak) nodutuvemu
tavada vedaniya danduvamata biyavannan hata api ehi samgnavak (ata hæra dama) itiri kalemu
tavada musa tula da api ohu firavun veta pæhædili balayak samaga evu avasthave (sadhakayak) viya
evita ohu (firavun) ohuge bala æniya hetuven (visvasa kirimata) pitupæveya. tavada (musa) “huniyam karuveki. ese nætahot ummattakayeki” yæyi ohu pævasiya
evita api ohu ha ohuge senava grahanaya kalemu. evita ohu dos naganu læbuveku lesin api ovun muhudata heluvemu
tavada ad janaya tula da (samgnavan æta) ovun veta api vanasana sulangak evu avasthave da (samgnavak viya)
e veta pæmini kisivek ho eya dirapat natabun men pat kalak misa athæriye næta
tavada samud janaya tula da “numbala tika kalakata bhukti vindinu” yæyi kiyanu læbu avasthave da (samgnavak) viya
namut ovunge paramadhipatige niyogayata ovuhu akikaru vuha. evita ovun bala sitiyadima akunu pahara ovun grahanaya kaleya
evita sita gænimata pava ovunata nohæki viya. tavada ovuhu tamantama udav karagannan novuha
tavada mita pera nuhge janaya da (api grahanaya kalemu.) niyata vasayenma ovuhu papita samajayak vuha
tavada api ahasa eya (apage) bala saktiya yoda idi kalemu. tavada niyata vasayenma api vyapta karannan vemu
tavada mahapolova, api eya diga hæriyemu. (vidhimat va) diga hæriyavun yahapat viya
numbala menehi kala hæki vanu pinisa sæma deyakma yugala vasayenma api mævvemu
eheyin numbala allah veta vegayen yanu. niyata vasayenma mama numbala sandaha pæmini ohugen vu pæhædili anaturu hangavanneki
tavada numbala allah samaga venat deviyeku pat nokaranu. niyata vasayenma mama ohugen numbala sandaha pæmini pæhædili avavada karanneku vemi
elesaya ovunata pera sitiyavun veta yam daham dutayaku pæmini vita huniyam karuveki nætahot ummattakayeki yæyi ovuhu pævasuva misa noviya
ovun ekineka me gæna upades denno da? ese nova ovun simava ikmava giya pirisaki
eheyin numba ovungen hæri yanu. hetuva numba dos naganu labanneku novanu æta
tavada numba menehi karanu. hetuva niyata vasayenma menehi kirima deva visvasavantayinta prayojanavat vanu æta
tavada jin vargaya ha manava vargaya vana ovun mata gætikam kirimata misa mama nomævvemi
ovungen mama kisidu posanayak apeksa nokarami. emenma ovun mata ahara sæpayiya yutu yæyi da mama apeksa nokarami
niyata vasayenma allah vana ohu sthavara balaya æti maha posakayaya
eheyin niyata vasayenma aparadha kalavun vanahi ovunge sagayinge papayan men papayan ovunata æta. eheyin ovuhu (danduvama) ikman karannæyi magen nopætiya yutuya
pratiksepa kalavunata, ovunata pratigna denu læbunu ovunge dinaye vinasaya æta
tur kanda mata divuramin
liyana lada granthaya mata divuramin
digu harina lada lekhanayehi
bayitul mahmur (hevat sat ahasata ihalin æti malakvarunge næmædum pala) mata divuramin
ihalata osavana lada viyana mata divuramin
gini molavanu labana (rælivalin yut) muhuda mata divuramin
niyata vasayenma numbage paramadhipatige barapatala danduvama siduvannakmaya
eya valakvana kisiveku næta
edina ahasa tadabala calanayakin calanaya vana dinayayi
tavada kandu bhayanaka salitayakin salita veyi
eheyin boru kalavunata edina vinasayayi
ovuhu vanahi (puhu katayutu vala) nirata va kelilol karamin sitinno veti
edina niraye ginna veta dakkagena yamin væren tallu karanu læbe
“meya numbala kavara ginnak boru karamin sitiyehu da ema ginnayi.”
meya huniyamak da? ese nætahot numbala nodakinnehu da

numbala ehi pivisa dævenu. evita numbala ivasa vinda dara gatta da noivasuva da numbalata eka samanaya. niyata vasayenma numbalata pratiphala pirinamanu labanuye numbala sidu karamin siti dæ sandahaya
niyata vasayenma biya bætimatun (svarga) uyanhi ha sæpatehi sitinnoya
ovunge paramadhipati ovunata pirinæmu dæ pilibanda va satutu vannan lesa sitinnoya. tavada ovunge paramadhipati niraye danduvamin ovun araksa kaleya
numbala (melova) sidu karamin siti dæ hetuven satutin anubhava karanu. tavada panaya karanu.(yæyi pavasanu læbe)
pelata tabana lada ændan mata hansivemin (sititi). tavada api ovunata hurun in (hevat dækum kalu yuvatiyan) saranapava dennemu

tavada kavrun visvasa kaloda, tavada ovunge parapura visvasayen yutu va ovunva anugamanaya karanneda, ovunge parapura api ovun samaga ek karannemu. tavada ovunge kriyaven api ovunata kisivak adu nokarannemu. sæma pudgalayakuma ohu upaya gat dæta æpayak lesa sitinneya
ovun priya karana dæyin palaturu ha mamsa api ovunata sapayannemu
ovuhu ehi (pæn) kusalana huvamaru kara ganiti. kisidu nisphala dæyak ho papayata polambavimak ho ehi næta
tavada ovun venuven (sevaye nirata) sitina lamun ovun vata yati. niyata vasayenma ovuhu suraksa karana lada mutu men veti
ovungen ætæmek ætæmeku vetata muhunalamin ekineka vimasa ganiti
“mita pera niyata vasayenma api apage pavula sambandhayen biyata patvannan lesa sitiyemu” yæyi ovuhu pavasati
“evita allah apa veta upakara kaleya. tavada pilissena ginne vedanaven ohu apa mudava gatteya.”
“niyata vasayenma api pera sitama ohuta ayædimin sitiyemu. niyata vasayenma ohu upakarasili maha karunavantaya.”
eheyin numba upades denu. numbe paramadhipatige asirvadayen numba pena kiyanneku ho ummattakayaku ho nove
“ese nætahot ohu kaviyeki. kalayage ævæma (ohu vinasa karanu ætæyi) api ohu gæna balaporottu vannemu” yæyi ovuhu pavasanno da
“numbala balaporottuven sitinu. evita niyata vasayenma mama da balaperottu vannan aturin vemi” yæyi (nabivaraya) numba pavasanu
ese nætahot ovunge situvili ovunata me gæna niyoga karanne da? ese nætahot ovuhu simava ikmava giya pirisak da
ese nætahot “meya ohu getuveyæ”yi ovuhu pavasanno da? ese nova ovuhu visvasa nokarati
ovun satyavadin lesa sitiyehu nam me ha samana prakasayak ovuhu gena a yutuya
ese nætahot kisivak nomæti va ovun mavanu læbuvo da? ese nætahot mavanno ovuhu da
ese nætahot ovuhu ahas ha mahapolova mævvoda? ese nova ovuhu visvasa nokarati
ese nætahot ovun abiyasa numbage paramadhipatige nidanayan tibe da? ese nætahot (e mata) adhipatyaya daranno ovuhu da
nætnam ovunta inimagak tibi ehi ( ahase deva panividavalata) æhumkan detda? ese nam ovungen savandenna pæhædili sadhakayak genetva
ese nætahot (allah vana) ohuta duvarun vi numbalata (pamanak) putun vida
ese nætahot numba ovungen yamkisi kuliyak illannehi da? e hetuven ovuhu naya bara usulanno da
ese nætahot ovun abiyasa adrsyamana dæ (pilibanda gnanaya) tibi ovuhu satahan karanno da
ese nætahot ovuhu kumantranayak (numbata erehiva kirimata) adahas karanno da? pratiksepa kalavun vana ovuhumaya kumantranaye hasu vi sitinno
ese nætahot allahgen tora va (venat) devindeku ovunata sitit da? ovun adesa tabana dæyin allah suvisuddhaya
tavada ahasin kæbællak vætenu ovuhu dutuva vuvada (eva) godagæsunu valakulu samuhayak yæyi ovuhu pavasati
eheyin ehi ovun vinasa karanu labana ovunge dinaya ovun hamu vana tek numba ovun atahæra damanu
edina ovunge kumantranaya ovunata kisivakin prayojanavat noveyi. tavada ovuhu udav karanu nolabati
tavada niyata vasayenma aparadha kalavunata e (love danduvama) hæra tavat danduvamak æta. namut ovungen bahutarayak dena nodaniti

numbage paramadhipatige niyogaya udesa ivasa sitinu. manda niyata vasayenma numba sitinuye apage æs idiripitaya. tavada numba avadi vana avasthave numbage paramadhipatige prasamsa va tulin numba suvisuddha karanu
tavada ratriyehi da taru bæsa yana avasthavehi da numba ohu suvisuddha karanu
tavada væti (sængavi) yana taru mata divuramin
tavada numbalage sahacaraya (vana muhammad) mammula noviya. tavada ohu nomaga nogiyeya
tavada ohu mano icchaven kata nokarayi
eya heli darav karana lada deva panivida misa næta
ati balavat keneku (vana jibrayil) eya igænviya
(ohu alamkara) paripurna hædayen yukta viya. tavada ohu (ihalata næga nabi idiriye) dis vuveya
tavada ohu ihalama ksatijayehi viya
pasu va ohu pahalata pæmina (ohu) asalatama pæminiyeya
evita ohu dunu dekaka dura pramanayata viya. ese nætahot itat vada samipa viya
evita (allah) ohuta heli kala de, ohu ohuge gætta ( vu nabivaraya) ta heli kaleya
ohu (nabivaraya) dutu dæ (ohuge) sita boru nokaleya
eheyin ohu dutu dæ sambandhayen numbala ohu samaga vada karannehu da
tavada, nisakavama ohu (nabivaraya) tavat vatavak ohu (jibrayilva siya sæbæ svarupayen) pahala vanu dutuveya
sidratul muntaha (hevat mayima pihiti gasak) abiyasaya
e abiyasa jannatul mahva (hevat svarga uyana) viya
sidra gasa avaranaya karana dæ avaranaya karana vita
bælma ivat noviya. esema eya simava ikma noviya
tama uttama paramadhipatige imahat samgnavan kihipayak sæbævinma ohu dutuveya
lat ha uzza numbala dutuvehu da
anek tunvæniya manatya
numbalata pirimi(daruva)n ha ohuta gæhænu(daruva)n da
evita eya asadharana bedimaki

eva numbala ha numbalage mutun mittan evata nam tæbu (his artha) namayan misa næta. eva pilibanda kisidu balatala allah pahala nokaleya. ovuhu anumanaya ha sit asa karana dæ misa (venekak) anugamanaya nokarati. ovunge paramadhipatigen ovun veta sæbævinma yahamaga pæmina æta
ese nætahot taman kæmati dæ minisata tibe da
ehet matu lova ha melova allah satuya
ahashi malakvarun kopamanado sitinnaha. ovunge mædihatvima kisivakin prayojanavat noveyi. taman abhimata kota piligat ayata allah anumætiya dimen pasu va misa
niyata vasayenma kavrun matu lova pilibanda visvasa nokaranneda ovun malakvarunta gæhænunge namayen nam tabati
tavada e pilibanda va ovunata kisidu dænumak næta. ovuhu anumanaya misa venat kisivak anugamanaya nokarati. tavada niyata vasayenma anumanaya satyayata erehiva vu kisivakata prayojanavat novanu æta
eheyin apa menehi kirimen pitupa melova jivitaya hæra venekak apeksa nokarana aya oba nosalaka harinu
eya ovunge dænume pramanayayi. ohuge margayen nomaga giyavun gæna niyata vasayenma numbage paramadhipati vana ohu mænavin dannaya. emenma yahamaga læbuvan gæna da ohu mænavin dannaya
tavada ahas hi æti dæ ha mahapolove æti dæ allah satuya. napurukam kalavunata ovun sidu kala dæ anuva prativipaka denu pinisat yahapat ayurin yahakam kalavunata pratiphala denu pinisatya

ovuhu vanahi sulu væradi hæra maha papayangen ha asilacara dæyin vælaki sitiyavun veti. niyata vasayenma numbage paramadhipati samava dime di apramanaya. ohu numbala mahapolove bihi kala vita da numbalage mavvarunge kusaval tula numbala kalalayak lesa siti vita da numbala gæna mænavin dæna sitiye ohuya. eheyin numbala numbala gæna ma suddhavantayin yæyi nosalakanu. biya bætimatun pilibanda va mænavin danna ohuya
(satyaya margayen) hæri gos
svalpayak pirinama (itiriya) valakva gat aya va numba nodutuvehi da
ohu dakinnata nam, ohu veta sængævunu gnanaya tibeda
ese nætahot musage granthaye æti dæ ohu danvanu nolæbuve da
(agnavan) purna va itu kala ibrahimge granthaye æti dæ ohu danvanu nolæbuve da
enam, bara usulanna tavakekuge bara usulanne næta
minisata ohu utsaha kala dæ hæra vena kasivak nomæta
tavada niyata vasayenma ohuge utsahaya matu penvanu læbe
pasu va purnavat pratiphala ohuta pirinamanu labanneya. (yanuven musa ha ibrahimge granthaye viya)
tavada niyata vasayenma, avasanayedi (siyalu denage) nævata hæriyama, numbage paramadhipati vetayi
tavada niyata vasayenma ohu sinahava æti karanneya. ændimatada salasvanneya
tavada niyata vasayenma ohu maranayata pat karavanneya. tavada nævata pranaya denneya
niyata vasayenma ohu stri purusa lesin yuvala mava ætteya
niyata vasayenma ohu sukranu binduvakin eya vidina vita ( numbalava nirmanaya karanneya)
tavada niyata vasayenma nævatat nirmanaya kirima ohu kerehi (vu vagakimak) ya
tavada niyata vasayenma ohu pohosat karavanneya. sæhimata pat karavanneya
tavada niyata vasayenma ohu sihra (nam diptimat tarakave)hi himipanan ve
tavada niyata vasayenma pera visu ad janaya vinasa kale da ohuya
tavada samud janaya da (vinasa kaleya) evita ohu (kisiveku) itiri nokaleya
tavada pera siti nuhge janaya da (ohu vinasa kaleya.) niyata vasayenma ovuhu darunu lesa aparadha kota simava ikmava giya pirisak vuha
tavada udu yatikuru karanu læbu nagaraya da ohu bimata heluve ya
evita avaranaya kala dæ (vedanava) eya avaranaya kaleya
eheyin numbage paramadhipatige kavara anugrahayak numba sæka karannehi da
meya pera pævati avavada aturin vu avavadayaki
samipa vana dæ (viniscaya dinaya) samipa vi æta
allahgen tora va niravaranaya karanneku eyata næta
eheyin mema puvata gæna numbala puduma vannehuda
tavada numbala sinaha sennehuya. tavada numbala nohanda sitinnehuya
numbala nosælakillen sitihuya
eheyin numbala allahta sujud kota næmadum karanu
avasan horava samipa vi æta. tavada candraya pæli gos æta
tavada yam samgnavak ovun dutuva vuvada, ovun pitupa (meya) ‘pævata ena huniyamak’ yæyi pavasati
tavada ovuhu boru yæyi pavasa tama asavan anugamanaya karati. tavada (yahapat ha ayahapat yana) sæma karunakma siduvannaki
tavada valakvalana avavadayan sahita toraturu ovun veta sæbævinma pæmina æta
ehi gæmburu pragnava æta. namut ema avavadaya phalak noviya
eheyin (nabivaraya) numba ovungen ivat vanu (israfil hevat) kændavanna pilikul karunak veta kændavana dinayehi
ovunge bælma pahata helamin, niyata vasayenma ovun visiri sitina palangætiyan men minivala val vetin bæhæra veti
kændavanna veta (beli digu karamin) vegayen pæminennan lesin (ovuhu bæhæra veti.) “meya duskara dinayaki” yæyi pratiksepakayo pavasati
ovunata pera siti nuhge janaya da boru kaloya. esema ovuhu apage gætta boru kota ummattakayeku yæyi pævasuha. tavada ohu palava harinu læbiya
evita ohu niyata vasayenma “ma abibava yanu læbuvemi. eheyin mata udav karanu mænava!” yæyi ohuge paramadhipatita prarthana kaleya
evita api dharanipata væsi jalayen ahashi doraval vivrta kalemu
tavada api mahapolovehi ulpat hata gænvuyemu. evita pera nirnaya karana lada karunak anuva ema jalaya (væsi jalaya samaga) ekatu viya
tavada lælivalinda, ænavalinda sakaskarana lada dæ (næva) mata usula ( nuh saha ohuge janaya araksakara) gattemu
pratiksepa karanu læba siti ayata vipakayak vasayen apage æs idiripita eya yatra viya
tavada sæbævinma api eya (pasukalina janayata) samgnavak vasayen itiri kalemu. eheyin upades labana kisivaku ho vet da
evita mage danduvama ha mage avavadaya kese vida
tavada al kuranaya menehi kirima sandaha sæbævinma api pahasu kalemu. eheyin menehi karana kisivaku ho vet da
ad samuhaya boru kaloya. eheyin mage danduvama ha mage anaturu ængavima kese vi da
abhagyayamat dinaka niyata vasayenma api ovun veta maha sabdayakin yut sulagak akhandava evvemu
niyata vasayenma ovun mulinudurana lada rataindi gas kadan men eya minisunva ugula (visikara) dæmiya
evita mage danduvama ha mage avavadaya kese vi da
tavada al kuranaya menehi kirima sandaha sæbævinma api pahasu kalemu. eheyin menehi karana kisivaku ho vet da
samud janaya ema avavadaya boru kaloya
apagen ek miniseku vu ohu va da api anugamanaya kala yutte? niyata vasayenma api evita nomagehi ha duskaratvaya tula vannemu
“apa aturin ohu veta upadesa idiripat karanu læbuve da? ese nova ohu garvayen yut maha borukarayeki.”
garvayen yut maha borukaraya kavurun dæyi heta (malavun keren nægituvanu labana) dina ovuhu dæna ganu æta
niyata vasayenma api otu dena ovunata pariksanayak lesin evanno vuyemu. eheyin (salih!) numba ovun gæna vimasillen sitinu. tavada ivasimen sitinu
niyata vasayenma ovun atara (ha otu dena atara linde æti) jalayata kotasak æta. sæma pana varayakma idiripat karanu labannaki
evita ovuhu ovungen vu sagayaku kændavuha. evita ohu (kaduva) amora gena ( otu denage) gela nahara kapa hæriyeya
evita mage danduvama ha mage avavadaya kese vi da
niyata vasayenma api ovun veta ek gigurum handak evvemu. evita ovuhu satva galaka pægunu piduru men vuha
tavada al kuranaya avavada laba gænima sandaha sæbævinma api pahasu kalemu. eheyin avavada laba ganna kisivaku ho vet da
lutge janaya da ema avavadaya boru kaloya
niyata vasayenma api ovun veta gal kunatuvak evvemu. (eya ovun vinasa kaleya.) namut lutge janaya veta hæra. api ovun aluyam kalaye mudava gattemu
(meya) apa vetin vu asirvadayak vasayeni. api gunagaruka vuvanata pratiphala pirinamanuye elesaya
tavada apage grahanaya pilibanda sæbævinma ohu(lut) ovunata avavada kaleya. namut ema avavadaya pilibanda ovuhu sæka (kota tarka) kaloya
ohuge agantukayin pilibanda asilacara lesa hæsirimata ovuhu ohuta sæla kaloya. evita api ovunge æs andha kalemu. eheyin “mage danduvama ha mage avavadaya numbala bhukti vindinu” (yæyi pævasuvemu)
tavada sthira danduvamak udæsana sæbævinma ovunata uda viya
eheyin mage danduvama ha mage avavadaya numbala bhukti vindinu
tavada al kuranaya menehi kirima sandaha sæbævinma api pahasu kalemu. eheyin menehi karana kisivaku ho vet da
tavada firavunge janaya veta da avavadaya sæbævinma pæminiyeya
ovuhu apage vadan siyalla boru kaloya. evita api balavat baladhariyage grahanayen api ovun grahanaya kalemu
(makka væsiyeni) numbala atara sitina deva pratiksepakayin (pera visu) janayata vada srestha da? ese nætahot (danduvamin midimata) granthayan hi numbalata (yamkisi) nidahasak laba di tibeda
ese nætahot “api siyalloma ekinekata udav karana samuhayaki” (eyin jaya labanno vemu) yæyi ovuhu pavasanno da
mema pirisa parajayata pat karanu labanu æta. tavada ovuhu pasupasa hæri yanu æta
namut avasan horava ovunata pratigna denu læbuvaki. tavada avasan horava vadat bihisunuya. tavada vadat amihiriya
niyata vasayenma væradi karuvo nomagehida, tavada (nira ginne) vedanavehida sitinnaha
edina ovunge muhunu niraye ginna veta ædagena yanu læbe nira ginne sparsaya numbala bhukti vidinu (yæyi pavasanu læbe)
niyata vasayenma api sæma deyakma eya pramanayakin yutu va mævvemu
tavada apage niyogaya ek varak pamani. (eya) æsi piya gasannak meni
tavada sæbævinma api numbala men vuvan vinasa kalemu. eheyin menehi karana kisiveku ho vet da
tavada ovun sidu kala siyalu dæ lekhana vala (liyavi) æta
tavada kuda ha visala siyalu dæ liya tabanu læbiya
niyata vasayenma biya bætimatun ( svarga) uyanhi ha (ehi) ganga atara sitinnoya
sarva baladhikari raju abiyasa satyaya sthanayehiya
aparimita dayanvitayano
ohu al kuranaya igænviya
ohu minisa va mævveya
ohu ohuta pæhædiliva kata kirimata igenvuveya
hiru ha sandu niyamita ganan vilasayakata anuva gaganaya karayi
tavada taru ha gasa yana deka ohuta sujud karati
tavada ahasa ohu eya us kaleya. tavada (yuktiye) tulava pihituveya
yuktiye tulava numbala ullamghanaya nokaranu pinisa
tavada numbala sadharanayen yutu va tulanaya kriyatmaka karanu. tavada numbala tulavehi adu nokaranu
tavada mahapolova eya siyalu jivin sandaha (pahasuven) tæbuve ya
ehi palaturu da kopu sahita rataindi gas da æta
tavada potu sahita dhanya da suvandæti pælæti da æta
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
valan men viyali mætiyen ohu minisa mævveya
tavada ginnen vu dællen ohu jin vargaya mævveya
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
(ohu) nægenahiraval dekehi himipanan ha batahiraval dekehi himipananya
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
ohu muhudu deka ekinekata yavannata hæriya
e deka abibava noyana ayurin e deka atara badhakayak viya
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
e dekin mutu ha pabalu matu veyi
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
tavada kandu men muhudehi usin gaman karanu labana yatra da ohuta æta
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
e (mahapolova) mata æti siyalla vinasa vi yannakya
tavada tejanvitabhavayen ha gauravanvitabhavayen yukta numbage paramadhipatige muhuna nityayava pavati
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige kavara asirvadayan numbala dedena boru karannehu da
ahashi ha mahapolovehi sitinno(tama avasyatava) ohugen illa sititi. sæma dinakama ohu (tama) katayuttehi nirata va sitiyi
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
aho (minis ha jin) devargayani! api numbala venuven (viniscaya sandaha vu kalaya) ven karannemu
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
aho jin ha minis samuhayani! ahas ha mahapolove pætikada valin pala yæmata numbala hækiyava daranne nam numbala pala yanu. maha balayakin misa numbala pala noyanu æta
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
numbala (ayahapat) devargayata erehiva gini jala ha dumarayak evanu læbe. evita numbala devargaya (in araksa vannata) udav nolabanu æta
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
eheyin ahasa pæli giya vita eya tel men ratu pæhæ gænenu æta
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
eheyin edina miniseku ho jinvarayeku ho ohuge papaya gæna vimasanu nolabayi
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
væradi karuvo ovunge salakunu valin handuna ganu labati. evita idiri nalal kes roda ha pada valin grahanaya karanu labati
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
væradi karuvan eya boru yæyi pavasana niraya meya ve
e atara ha dædi rasmiya lodiya atara ovuhu kæraketi
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
tama paramadhipatige sannidhanaye peni sitimata biya vuvanta (svarga) uyan dekak æta
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
saravat atuvalin yukta (uyan) dekaki
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
e dekehi gala yana ulpat dekaki
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
sæma palaturakinma joduvak bægin e dekahi æta
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
ætirili mata hansi vannan lesini. ehi ætulata (istabrak vargaye) seda redden yuktaya. ema uyan dekehi palaturu samipayen pihitayi
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
evayehi damita bælmæti pirisidu kanya kumariyan veti. ovunata pera kisidu miniseku ho jinnuveku ho ovun sparsa kara næta
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
niyata vasayenma ovuhu mænik ha pabalu men veti
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
yahapatata yahapata misa venat pratiphalayak æt da
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
e dekata amatarava (tavat) uyan dekaki
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
(e deka) tada kola pæhæyen yuktaya
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
e dekehi utura gala yana ulpat dekaki
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
e dekehi palaturu da rataindi da delum da æta
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
rumat yahapat kantavo evayehi veti
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
kudaram tula sangava tabana lada lalanavo veti
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
ovunata pera kisidu miniseku ho jinnuveku ho ovun sparsa kara næta
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
kola pæhæti metta mata da alamkara bumuturunu mata da hansivannan lesa sititi
eheyin (minis ha jin yana) numbala dedenage paramadhipatige asirvadayan atarin kavarak numbala dedena boru karannehu da
tejanvitabhavayen ha gauravanvitabhavayen yut numbage paramadhipatige namaya ati utkrsta viya
sidu vana dæ (enam nægitavanu dinaya) sidu vu vita
ema siduvima boruvak noveyi
(eya aparadhakaruvan) pahat karavannaki. (dæhæmiyan) usas karavannaki
mahapolova kampanayakin kampanaya karanu læbu vita
tavada kandu sunu visunu kirimen sunu visunu karanu læbu vita
evita eya visirunu duvili bavata pat vanu æta
evita numbala varga tunak vannehuya
enam dakunu pasata vu janaya. ema dakunu pasata vu janaya yanu kavarek da
tavada vam pasata vu janaya. ema vam pasata vu janaya yanu kavarek da
peratugamihu peratu gamihuya
ovuhu (allahta) samipatayo veti
(ovun) sæpavat uyanhi sititi
mul ayagen vu pirisaki
tavada pasu pævata ennangen vu svalpayaki
(ovun) alamkara karana lada ændan mata sititi
e mata ekinekata muhunalamin hansivannan lesa sititi
lama viya sadatanika vu lamun ( samgraha kirima sandaha) ovun vata yati
diya daharaven puravanu læbu guru lettu, ketal ha kusalana samaga (ovun vata yati)
eyin ovunata hise rudava æti nove. tavada ovun mat noveti
ovun tora ganna paridi palaturu samaga
ovun asa karana paridi kurulu mamsa samaga
tavada dækumkalu kanya kumariyo da veti
(ovun) sangava tabana lada mutu valata samanaya
ovun (molovehi) sidu karamin siti dæ sandaha pratiphalayak vasayeni
ovuhu ehi puhu dæyakata ho papaya æti karana katavakata ho savan nodeti
santiyayi santiyayi yanuven pavasanu læbima misa. (vena kisivakata savan nodeti)
dakunu pasa janaya, dakunu pasa janaya yanu kavarek da
(ovun) katu nomæti masan gas atarehiya
tavada kæn ellena kesel gas ataraya
digu karanu læbu sevanæli ataraya
gala yavanu labana jalaya ataraya
boho palaturu ataraya
kisidu kappaduvak næta. emenma kisidu tahanam kirimak da næta
us va tabana lada ætirili ataraya
niyata vasayenma api ovun (alamkara) nirmanayakin nirmanaya kalemu
api ovun kanya kumariyan bavata pat kalemu
pembara sama vayasæti
dakunu pasa janaya sandaha (meva sudanam kara tibe)
(ovun) mul ayagen vu pirisaki
tavada pasu pævata ennangen vu pirisaki
tavada vam pasa janaya. vam pasa janaya yanu kavarek da
(ovun) lo diya ha gini dæli sulam ataraya
kalu dumarayen yut hevana ataraya
tavada (ehi) kisidu sisilak ho alamkara darsanayak ho næta
niyata vasayenma ovuhu eyata pera (melovehi) sæpa vindinnan lesa sitiyaha
tavada ovuhu mahat papayan mata hituvakkara lesa rændi sitinnan vuha
tavada “api miya gos pas ha asthi bavata pat vu pasu niyata vasayenma api nævata nægituvanu labanno vemu dæ” yi ovuhu pavasamin sitiyaha
“apage mularambhaka mutun mittan da?” (yanuven da pævasuha)
“niyata vasayenma mularambhakayin ha pasu pævata ennan (yana siyallanhata) (nabivaraya) numba pavasanu
niyamita dinaka niyamita velavaka ek ræs karanu labanno veti
in pasu: aho borukarayan vu nomaga giyavuni! nisakavama numbalamaya
niyata vasayenma numbala zakkum gasin anubhava karanno veti
evita eyin kusaval purava ganno veti
e mata lo diyen panaya karanno veti
pipasita otuvan panaya karannak men panaya karanno veti
meya viniscaya dinaye ovunge samgrahaya ve
apaya numbala va mævve. eheyin ( numbalava nævata nægituvannemu yanuven) numbala satyaya kala yutu nove da
numbala sukranu lesa pita karana dæ gæna numbala sita bæluvehu da
eya mævve numbala da ese nætahot (ehi) mævumkaruvo vanne apa da
numbala atara maranaya nirnaya kale apaya. apava abhibava yamata (kisivekuta) nohæka
numbalage hædaruva venas kirimatat numbala nodanna svarupayaka numbala va (yali) bihi kirimatat (api saktiya laddo vemu)
tavada mul mævima gæna sæbævinma numbala dannehuya. eheyin numbala menehi kala yutu nove da
numbala vapurana dæ gæna numbala sita bæluvehu da
eya vaga karanuye numbala da? ese nætahot (ehi) vagakaruvo apa da
api abhimata karanne nam eya viyælunu ipænili bavata pat karannata tibuni. evita numbala pudumayata pat vanu æta
“niyata vasayenma api naya karayo vemu.”
“ese nova api valakvanu læbuvo vemu.” yæyi pavasamin (numbala pudumayata pat vanu æta)
numbala panaya karana jalaya desa numbala niriksa kota bæluvehu da
eya valakulen pahala kale numbala da? ese nætahot (eya) pahala karanno apada
api abhimata kara ætnam eya lunu bavata pat karannata tibuni. eheyin numbala gunagaruka viya yutu nove da
numbala dalvana ginna vimasillen bæluvehu da
(ema ginna nipada vana) gasa nirmanaya kale numbala da? ese nætahot (ehi) nirmanakaruvo apa da
api eya menehi kirimak lesin ha maginta (prayojanavat) bhandayak lesin pat kalemu
eheyin numbage ati mahat paramadhipatiyanange namayen numba suvisuddha karanu
eheyin taraka rændena tæn mata mama divurami
tavada numbala dannehu nam niyata vasayenma eya imahat divurumaki
niyata vasayenma eya gauravaniya kuranayaki
araksa karanu læbu lekhanayehiya
eya pivituru aya hæra venat kisivaku sparsa nokarati
lovæsiyange paramadhipatigen vu pahala kirimaki
numbala mema prakasaya gæna da nosalaka harinnan lesa sitinuye eheyin da
tavada numbalage posanaya sandaha (krtaguna salakannak vasayen) niyata vasayenma numbala boru kirima (tora) gannehu da
(kenekuge pranaya) uguru dandata langa vu vita
numbala ema avasthave balamin sitinnehuya
tavada ohu veta api numbalata vada samipayen vemu. namut numbala nodakinu æta
eheyin numbala vagakiva yuttan novannehu nam
(numbala sitana paridi) numbala satyavadin nam numbala eya nævata gena enu
eheyin ohu (allahta) samipatayin aturin vuye nam
sænasuma da pranita ahara da sæpavat (svarga) uyan da æta
ohu dakunu pasa janaya aturin vu keneku vuye nam
ese nam dakunu pasa janaya aturin vu obata santiyayi
ohu nomaga giya boru karannan aturin vuye nam
evita lo diyen vu navatænaki
tavada nira ginnehi dævimaki
sthira satyaya vanuye niyata vasayenma meyamaya
eheyin numbage atimahat vu paramadhipatige namayen suvisuddha karanu
ahashi ha mahapolove æti dæ allah va suvisuddha karati. tavada ohu maha pragnavanta sarva baladhariya
ahashi ha mahapolove adhipatyaya ohu satuya. ohu pranaya denneya. tavada maranayata pat karanneya. tavada ohu siyalu dæ kerehi saktiya ættaya
ohu prarambhakayaya. avasanayaya. vidyamanayaya. (adrsyamana) abhyantarayaya. tavada ohu siyalu dæ pilibanda sarva gnaniya

ohu vanahi ahas ha mahapolova dina hayak tula mava ars mata sthapita viya. mahapolova tulata pivisena dæ da in bæhæra vana dæ da ahasin pahala vana dæ da ehi ihalata yana dæ da ohu dani. tavada numbala kotænaka sitiya da ohu numbala samagaya. tavada allah numbala sidu karana dæ pilibanda va sarva niriksakaya
ahashi ha mahapolove adhipatyaya ohu satuya. tavada siyalu karunu yomu karanu labanuye allah vetaya
ohu ratriya dahavalehi ætupha karayi. tavada dahavala ratriyehi ætupha karayi. tavada ohu hadavat tula pavatina dæ pilibanda sarva gnaniya

allah ha ohuge daham dutayanan pilibanda numbala visvasa karanu. tavada kavara visayayaka numbala va (bharakara) niyojitayin bavata ohu pat kale da evan dæyin numbala viyadam karanu. eheyin numbala aturin visvasa kota viyapæhædam kalavun vana ovunata mahat kuliyak æta

numbala visvasa karannavun nam, numbalage paramadhipati pilibanda numbala visvasa karanu pinisa numbala va rasulvaraya ærayum karamin sitiya di ha numbalage pratignava ohu gena tibiya di, numbala allah va visvasa nokirimata numbalata kumak vida
ohu vanahi numbala va andhakarayangen alokaya veta bæhæra karanu pinisa pæhædili samgna tama gætta veta pahala karanneya. tavada niyata vasayenma allah numbalata senehevantaya. maha karunikaya

allahge margaye viyadam nokara sitimata numbalata kumak vida? ahashi ha mahapolove urumayan allahta himiya. jayagrahanayata pera viyadam kota satan vædunavun (pasugaminta) samana nove. ovuhu in pasu va viyadam kota satan vædunavunta vada taratiramin ati mahat vuvo veti. tavada siyallanta allah yahapata pratigna kaleya. tavada numbala sidu karana dæ pilibanda va allah abhignanavantaya
kavareku allahta alamkara nayak pirinamanne da evita ohu eya ohuta guna kara denu æta. tavada gauravani ya kuliyak ohuta himiya

edina ovun idiripasin da ovunge dakunu pasin da, ovunge alokaya vegayen gaman karana deva visvasa karannan ha visvasa karanniyan dakinu æta. edina numbalage suba pætuma “evata pahalin gamgavan gala basna (svarga) uyanya. ehi sadatanikayinya. atimahat jayagrahanaya eyamaya.”

edina kuhaka pirimin ha kuhaka kantavo visvasa kalavun desa bala “numbala apa desa balanu. numbalage alokayen yamak apa da laba gannemu” yæyi pavasati. (evita) “numbalage pasupasata numbala hæri gos numbala alokaya soya ganu” yæyi kiyanu læbe. evita ovun atara bittiyak tabanu læbe. eyata dorak æta. ehi abhyantaraya, etula karunavayi. ehi pitata, ehi idiripasin danduvamayi

“api numbala samaga nositiyemu dæyi” (pitata sitina) ovuhu ovun amatati. “eseya namut numbala numbalatama arbuda æti kara gattehuya. numbala (vinasaya) balaporottu vuha. tavada numbala sæka kalehuya. allahge niyogaya pæminena tek ema asavan numbala va ravata dæmiya. emenma allah sambandhayen ravatalana dæ numbalava ravata dæmuveya

eheyin ada dina numbalagen ho pratiksepa kalavungen ho kisidu vandiyak (nidahasa sandaha) ganu nolæbe. tavada numbalage navatæna (nira) ginnaya. eya numbalage bharakaruya. tavada yomu vana sthanaya napuru viya

allah menehi kirima hetuven da satyayen pahala vu dæ (menehi kirima) hetuven da ovunge hadavat biyata pat va tæti ganna mohota nopæminiye da? mita pera deva grantha pirinamanu læbu aya men ovuhu noviya yutuya. ovun veta kalaya digu va pævatini. evita ovunge hadavat darunu viya. ovungen bahutarayak dena papatarayoya
mahapolova miya giya pasu va niyata vasayenma allah eya pranavat karana bava numbala dæna ganu. numbala vataha gata hæki vanu pinisa numbalata ema sadhaka sæbævinma api pæhædili kalemu
niyata vasayenma dan dennan ha dan denniyan da alamkara nayak lesin allahta naya dun aya da vanahi ovunata eya guna kara denu læbe. tavada ovunata gauravaniya pratiphala æta

tavada allah ha ohuge dutavarun visvasa kalavun vanahi ovuhumaya satyavadihu. emenma ovunge paramadhipati abiyasa saksi karuvo. ovunge kuliya ha ovunge alokaya ovunata æta. tavada pratiksepa kota apage vadan borukalavun vanahi ovuhumaya nira vasihu

niyata vasayenma melova jivitaya vanahi keliyaki. tavada vinodayaki. tavada alamkarayaki. tavada numbala ekineka atara purasaram dodannaki. tavada dhanaya ha daruvan sambandhayen (tarangakari lesa) vædi kara gannaki. (eya) varsavak meni. eya pælæti hata ganva saravat bavata pat vima (deviyan pratiksepa karana) goviyan satutata pat kaleya. pasu va eya viyali kaha pæhæ gænvenu numba dakinu æta. namut matu lovehi dædi danduvamak ha allahgen vu samava ha trptiya æta. melova jivitaya ravatalana bhandayak misa næta

numbalage paramadhipatigen vu samava veta ha svargaya veta numbala peratugami vanu. ehi pramanaya ahasehi ha maha polovehi pramanaya meni. allah ha ohuge dutayanan va visvasa kalavunata sudanam karanu læba æta. eya allahge anugrahaya ve. ohu abhimata karana ayata eya pirinamayi. tavada allah atimahat anugrahayen yuktaya
mahapolovehi ho numbala tula ho kavara vipatak sidu vuvada eva mævimata perama granthaye liya tibimen misa (eva) næta. niyata vasayenma eya allah veta pahasu karyayaki
numbalata atapasu vu dæ gæna numbala duk novanu pinisat ohu numbalata piri næmu dæ gæna numbala satutu novanu pinisatya. tavada purasaram dodana sæma kenekuva ma allah priya nokarayi

ovuhu vanahi masurukam pamin janayata da masurakama niyama karannan veti. tavada kavareku ho (deva visvasayen) hærenne da evita niyata vasayenma allah avasyataven toraya, prasamsalabhiya (yæyi dænaganu)

sæbævinma api apage daham dutavarun pæhædili sadhaka samaga evvemu. tavada janaya yuktiya itu karanu pinisa ovun samaga deva granthaya ha tulava da pahala kalemu. tavada api yakada pahala kalemu. ehi dædi saktiya da minisunata prayojana da æta. tavada adrsyamana tattvaye taman ha tama dutavarunta udav karanuye kavurun dæyi allah dæna ganu pinisaya. niyata vasayenma allah maha balavat sarva baladhariyaya

tavada sæbævinma api nuh ha ibrahim (daham dutayin lesa) evvemu. tavada ovun dedenage parapura tula duta mehevara ha deva granthaya pat kalemu. evita ovun aturin maga labannan vuha. emenma ovun aturin bahutarayak dena papatarayo vuha

pasu va api ovunge piya satahan anugamanaya karavamin apage tavat dutavarun evvemu. tavada maryamge put isavada anugamanaya karannata sælæsvuyemu. tavada api ohuta injilaya pirinæmuvemu. tavada ohu va anugamanaya kalavunge hadavat tula adaraya ha karunava æti kalemu. ovuhu (kitunu) sramana vrttiyata patvima alutin æti kara gattoya. allahge trptiya soyanu pinisa misa api ovun veta eya niyama nokalemu. eheyin ovun eya pilipædiya yutu niyama ayurin eya pilinopæddoya. eheyin ovun aturin visvasa kalavunata ovunge kuliya api pirinæmuvemu. tavada ovun aturin bahutarayak dena papatarayoya

aho visvasa kalavuni! numbala allahta biya bætimat vanu. tavada ohuge dutayanan visvasa karanu. ohuge karunaven degunayak ohu numbalata pirinamanu æta. tavada numbala emagin gaman karana alokayak da ohu numbalata æti karayi. tavada ohu numbalata samava deyi. tavada allah ati ksamasiliya. maha karunanvitaya

allahge anugrahayata vada kisivak mata taman saktiya nodarana bavat niyata vasayenma bhagyaya allahge atehi æti bavat ohu abhimata karana ayata eya pirinamana bavat agam lat janaya dæna ganu pinisaya. tavada allah atimahat bhagyaya sampannaya
